title: El Camino Real de Tierra Adentro National Historic Trail: Photo Gallery
body: Photo Gallery                    Discover the Jornada del Muerto   12 Photos  New visitor use sites and exhibits were dedicated on Saturday, October 30th, 2010. The day included hiking the retracement trail (an original segment) along of El Camino Real de Tierra Adentro NHT.          Historic Sites   9 Photos  El Camino Real de Tierra Adentro National Historic Trail offers an exciting passage through time: For over 300 years the trail has been a transportation corridor of Indian trade, Spanish settlement, search for gold, and bustling communities. Today much of the trail parallels Interstate 25. Get off the   fast lane, slow down the pace, and travel the many Camino Real sites that offer stories on your American history.
